row.1: The entrance to the shelter is a massive steel door, rusted by the years and covered with ivy and moss.
row.2: An old sign, half-erased by time, reads: 'Shelter Alpha - Authorized Personnel Only'. You approach the entrance with a mix of curiosity and apprehension.

row.3: Pure white on pure white, nothing seems to change, but add a shadow, and colors start to dance. When the light is soft or strong, Hidden shades knock at our door.
row.4: In one corner of the room, there is a control panel with four buttons and a torn document indicating that the correct sequence is Yellow, Pink, Green, and Orange. Unfortunately, the buttons are unlabeled and color perceptions may be affected by color blindness.

row.1: You need to find the correct combination of 4 elements without delay. There is no repeated color in the combination.
row.2: Good luck, survivor. May the CaM-RuN-a11Y injection guide you to freedom.
